title: c yt channel
content: can anyone suggest best youtube channel for C program in english from scratch

comments.body: Code with harry is good if you know Hindi
I’ve seen his videos for python and honestly he teaches pretty much surface level which wouldn’t be enough
Can u suggest any in english

Tbh I'd suggest you to complete a crash course to get a basic understanding of the syntax. Then thoroughly read and understand slides. All what's left for you to do now is to solve shit ton of programs of all kinds. Helps
Beginner C videos by Jacob sorber.
